name: react-svg-progress
description: An indefinite circular progress inspired by Google's progress indicator. Based off of https://github.com/nathanhoad/react-loading-animation.

scripts.build: npm run tsc && npm run webpack
scripts.webpack: webpack dist/index.js dist/bundled.js && webpack dist/tests/test.js dist/tests/bundled.js

author: Joshua Harms <joshua@nozzlegear.com>
